transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another using an allowance.

transferAndCall.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address and executes a function call.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for a given address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of an owner.

approve.description: Allows a spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

increaseApproval.description: Increases the allowance a spender has to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.

decreaseApproval.description: Decreases the allowance a spender has to spend tokens on behalf of the caller.

Approval.description: Emitted when a spender is approved or allowance is changed.
